definition: nickname of Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮/Wolong giant panda nature reserve 臥龍大熊貓保護區|卧龙大熊猫保护区 in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan/Wolong district of Nanyang city 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan
lit. hidden dragon/fig. emperor in hiding
to lie/to crouch
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
Wolong district of Nanyang city 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan
Wolong giant panda nature reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan
pinyin: wo4 long2 da4 xiong2 mao1 bao3 hu4 qu1

definition: Wollongong, Australia
Wolong nature reserve in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan, home of the giant panda 大熊貓|大熊猫
pinyin: Wo4 long2 zi4 ran2 bao3 hu4 qu1

sentences.english: To learn about the Wolong Panda Reserve was really interesting.
sentences.chinese: 了解到卧龙熊猫保护区的情况真有意思。

sentences.english: It's said people standing on the bridge can see the most beautiful scenery of Wolong Lake.
sentences.chinese: 听说在那桥上可以看到卧龙湾最美的景色。

sentences.english: The center has already taken 53 pandas that had been living at the Wolong Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 中心已经收容了卧龙自然保护区内的53只大熊猫。

sentences.english: Liu did not say when the pandas would return to Wolong.
sentences.chinese: 刘绍勇并没说熊猫什么时候会回到卧龙。

sentences.english: I'm Jingjing, come from the beautiful molonggang , Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 嘿嘿，我是晶晶，熊猫来自那美丽的四川卧龙岗。

sentences.english: I know we are nearing Wolong Lake.
sentences.chinese: 咱们就离卧龙湾不远了。

sentences.english: First, we went to see the pandas in Wolong.
sentences.chinese: 首先我们去卧龙看了大熊猫。

sentences.english: Chinese people have successfully bred pandas in Wolong National Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 中国人在卧龙国家自然保护区成功养殖了大熊猫。

sentences.english: Panda cubs play at the China Wolong Giant Panda Research Center in Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 四川卧龙大熊猫研究中心的熊猫宝宝。

Mt Longmen, the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin, an active geological fault line/Mt Longmen in Shandong/Mt Longmen in Henan
